The MiDeer finger paint has a creamy texture that is safe, non-toxic and easy to clean! It doesn't leave any stains on skin once washed with soap and water.

Clean, bright colors enhance the sensory experience for young creative learners.
Each set includes 6,8 tubes or 12 tubes of 60ml finger paints in different and vibrant colors.
Young children will enjoy painting with their fingers and combing over the paint to produce textured effects.
